sourcesContent:
let message = {
    PERSONAL_PAGE: {
        BLANK_RESTYPE: 'Please select Resident Type',
        BLANK_MOH: 'Please select Holding Mode',
        BLANK_PAN: 'Please enter PAN',
        VALID_PAN: 'Please enter a valid PAN',
        BLANK_DOB: 'Please enter DOB',
        VALID_DOB: 'Please enter a valid DOB',
        MIN_AGE: 'Minimum age should be 18',
        BLANK_PAN_NAME: 'Please enter name',
        VALID_PAN_NAME: 'Please enter Name as on PAN',
        MIN_PAN_NAME: 'Minimum length of name as PAN should be greater than 2',
        BLANK_EMAIL: 'Please enter Email Id',
        VALID_EMAIL: 'Please enter a valid Email Id',
        BLANK_MOBILE: 'Please enter mobile number',
        VALID_MOBILE: 'Please enter a valid mobile number',
        LENGTH_MOBILE: 'Please enter 10 digits mobile number',
        BLANK_OVS_ADDRESS: 'Please enter overseas address',
        MIN_OVS_ADDRESS: 'Overseas address should be minimum of length 10 characters',
        BLANK_PINCODE: 'Please enter overseas zipcode',
        MIN_PINCODE: 'Overseas zipcode should be minimum of length 6 digits',
        VALID_PINCODE: 'Please enter a valid overseas zipcode',
        MINOR_MAX_AGE: 'Minor age should be less than 18 years',
        BLANK_GREL: 'Please select Guardian relationship',
        BLANK_GGEN: 'Please select Guardian gender'
    },
    FATCA_PAGE: {
        BLANK_INCSLAB: 'Please select income slab',
        BLANK_BIRTHCNTY: 'Please select birth country',
        BLANK_NATION: 'Please select Nationality',
        FATCA_TNC: 'Please select checkbox',
        BLANK_OTHER_COUNTRY: "Please select other country",
        BLANK_TAXID: 'Please enter foreign tax id'
    },
    NOMINEE_PAGE: {
        BLANK_NAME: 'Please enter name',
        VALID_NAME: 'Please Enter valid name',
        MIN_NAME: 'Minimum length of name should be greater than 2',
        BLANK_REL: 'Please select relationship',
        BLANK_PERCENTAGE: 'Please enter percentage',   
        BLANK_ADDRESS: 'Please enter address',
        MIN_ADDRESS: 'Address length should be 10 characters',
        TOTAL_PERCENT: 'Total nominee percentage should be 100'
    },
    BANK_PAGE: {
        BLANK_IFSC: 'Please enter ifsc code',
        BLANK_ACCNUM: 'Please enter account number',
        BLANK_MICR: 'Please enter micr code',
        BLANK_INVNAME: 'Please enter investor name',
        BLANK_ACCTYPE: 'Please enter account type',
        TNC: 'Please select checkbox'
    },
    STP_PAGE: {
        BLANK_DATE: "Date cannot be blank",
        VALID_DATE: "Please enter a valid date"
    }
}

export default message;
